import React from 'react'; import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next'; const ProductCompliancePolicy = () => { const { t } = useTranslation(); return (

{t('productCompliance.title')}

{t('productCompliance.welcome')}

{t('productCompliance.compliance_and_requirements.description')}

{t('productCompliance.compliance_and_requirements.title')}

{t('productCompliance.compliance_and_requirements.evaluation')}

{t('productCompliance.compliance_and_requirements.backoffice')}

    {t('productCompliance.compliance_and_requirements.details', { returnObjects: true }).map((item, index) => (
  • {item}
    • ))}

{t('productCompliance.non_compliance_consequences.title')}

{t('productCompliance.non_compliance_consequences.description')}

    {t('productCompliance.non_compliance_consequences.sanctions', { returnObjects: true }).map((item, index) => (
  • {item}
    • ))}

{t('productCompliance.communication_with_buyers.title')}

{t('productCompliance.communication_with_buyers.description')}

    {t('productCompliance.communication_with_buyers.requirements', { returnObjects: true }).map((item, index) => (
  • {item}
    • ))}

{t('productCompliance.platform_commitment.title')}

{t('productCompliance.platform_commitment.description')}

{t('productCompliance.compliance_responsibilities.title')}

    {t('productCompliance.compliance_responsibilities.participants', { returnObjects: true }).map((item, index) => (
  • {item}
    • ))}

{t('productCompliance.platform.title')}

{t('productCompliance.platform.description')}

{t('productCompliance.legal_and_regulatory_updates.title')}

{t('productCompliance.legal_and_regulatory_updates.description')}

); }; export default ProductCompliancePolicy;
